Verses: 1 aagaiyaal, Naam Kettavaigalaivittu Vilagaadhapadikku, Avaigalai Migundha Jaakkiradhaiyaaik Gavanikkavendum.

2 enenil, Dhevadhoodhar Moolamaai Sollappatta Vasanaththirku Virodhamaana Endha Seygaikkum Keezhppadiyaamaikkum Needhiyaana Thandanai Varaththakkadhaaga Avargaludaiya Vasanam Urudhippaduththappattirukka,
3 mudhalaavadhu Karththar Moolamaai Arivikkappattu, Pinbu Avaridaththil Kettavargalaale Namakku Urudhiyaakkappattadhum,

4 adaiyaalangalinaalum Arpudhangalinaalum Palavidhamaana Balaththa Seygaigalinaalum, Thammudaiya Siththaththinpadi Pagirndhukoduththa Parisuththa Aaviyin Varangalinaalum, Dhevan Thaame Saatchikoduththadhumaayirukkira Ivvalavu Peridhaana Ratchippaikkuriththu Naam Kavalaiyatriruppomaanaal Dhandanaikku Eppadith Thappiththukkolluvom.
5 inivarum Ulagaththaikkuriththup Pesugirome, Adhai Avar Thoodhargalukkuk Keezhppaduththavillai.
6 oru Idaththile Oruvan Saatchiyaaga: Manushanai Neer Ninaikkiradharkum, Manushanudaiya Kumaaranai Neer Visaarikkiradharkum Avan Emmaaththiram?

7 avanai Thevadhoodharilum Satru Siriyavanaakkineer; Magimaiyinaalum Ganaththinaalum Avanukku Mudisootti, Ummudaiya Karaththin Kiriyaigalin Mel Avanai Adhigaariyaaga Vaiththu, Sagalaththaiyum Avanudaiya Paadhangalukkuk Keezhppaduththineer Endru Sonnaan.
8 sagalaththaiyum Avanukkuk Keezhppaduththinaar Engira Vishayaththil, Avar Avanukkuk Keezhppaduththaadha Porulondrumillai; Appadiyirundhum, Innum Avanukku Sagalamum Keezhppattirukkak Kaanom.

9 endraalum, Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyinaal Ovvoruvarukkaagavum, Maranaththai Rusipaarkkumpadikku Dhevathoodharilum Satru Siriyavaraakkappattirundha Yesu Maranaththai Uththariththadhinimiththam Magimaiyinaalum Ganaththinaalum Mudisoottappattadhaik Kaangirom.

10 enendraal Thamakkaagavum Thammaaleyum Sagalaththaiyum Undaakkinavar, Anegam Pillaigalai Magimaiyil Konduvandhu Serkkaiyil Avargaludaiya Iratchippin Adhipadhiyai Ubaththiravangalinaale Pooranappaduththugiradhu Avarukketradhaayirundhadhu.
11 eppadiyenil, Parisuththanjseygiravarum Parisuththanjseyyappadugiravargalumaagiya Yaavarum Oruvaraal Undaayirukkiraargal; Idhinimiththam Avargalai Sagodhararendru Solla Avar Vetkappadaamal:
12 ummudaiya Naamaththai En Sagodhararukku Ariviththu, Sabai Naduvil Ummaith Thudhiththup Paaduven Endrum;
13 naan Avaridaththil Nambikkaiyaayiruppen Endrum; Idho, Naanum, Dhevan Enakkuk Koduththa Pillaigalum Endrum Solliyirukkiraar.

14 aadhalaal, Pillaigal Maamsaththaiyum Iraththaththaiyum Udaiyavargalaayirukka, Avarum Avargalaippola Maamsaththaiyum Iraththaththaiyum Udaiyavaraanaar; Maranaththukku Adhigaariyaagiya Pisaasaanavanaith Thamadhu Maranaththinaale Azhikkumpadikkum,
15 jeevakaalamellaam Maranabayaththinaale Adimaiththanaththirkullaanavargal Yaavaraiyum Vidudhalaipannumpadikkum Appadiyaanaar.
16 aadhalaal, Avar Dhevadhoodharukku Udhaviyaaga Kaikodaamal, Aabiragaamin Sandhadhikku Udhaviyaaga Kaikoduththaar.

17 andriyum, Avar Janaththin Paavangalai Nivirththi Seyvadharkedhuvaaga, Dhevakaariyangalaikkuriththu Irakkamum Unmaiyumulla Piradhaana Aasaariyaaraayirukkumpadikku Evvidhaththilum Thammudaiya Sagodhararukku Oppaagavendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
18 aadhalaal, Avardhaame Sodhikkappattu Paadupattadhinaale, Avar Sodhikkappadugiravargalukku Udhaviseyya Vallavaraayirukkiraar.
